price: then on the Day of Resurrection, you will dispute with one another before your Lord.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ
